lines.gurmukhi: Awpno suAMin jYsy lwgq ipAwro jIA jwnIAY vYso eI ipAwro skl sMswr kau
lines.transliteration_english: Aapano Suanni Jaisay Laagat Piaaro Jeea , Jaaneeai Vaiso Ee Piaaro Sakal Sansaar Kau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as one loves one's son by heart, so are their sons loved by all others in the world.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpno drbu jYsy rwKIAY jqn kir vYso eI smiJ sB kwhU ky ibauhwr kau
lines.transliteration_english: Aapano Darabu Jaisay Raakheeai Jatan Kari , Vaiso Ee Samajhi Sabh Kaahoo Kay Biuhaar Kau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as one takes full care of one's wealth and assets, so should one treat other's business and profession monetarily.

lines.gurmukhi: Asquiq inMdw suin ibAwpq hrK sog vYsIAY lgq jg Aink pRkwr kau
lines.transliteration_english: Asatouti Nindaa Souni Biaapat Harakh Soga , Vaiseeai Lagat Jag Anik Prakaar Kau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as one feels happy listening to one's praise and disturbed on listening slander about oneself, so should one acknowledge and think that others would feel the same.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy kul Drmu krm jYso jYso kw ko auqm kY mwin jwin bHm biRQwr kau ]398]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Kul Dharamu Karam Jaiso Jaiso Kaa Ko , Outam Kai Maani Jaani Braham Bridaar Kau ?398?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, whatever is the business or profession of a person according to his family tradition, it should be accepted as supreme and most appropriate for him. (No one should be hurt on this account). This is enough to understand the Omnipresence of the L
